content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/soimort/you-get.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use an official Python runtime as a parent image
FROM python:3.8

# Set the working directory in the container to /app
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire contents of the repo into the container at /app
COPY . /app/

# Install any needed packages specified in requirements.txt
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

# Install the package from source
RUN python -m pip install .

# Run the tests to verify that everything is working
RUN python -m unittest discover -s tests/
